name: Transform Dino Robot - General Mobilization
description:
Transform! Dino Robot, A free Dino Robot game is provided by First Fox!

Choose the Dino Robot you want, assemble it,

Transform the assembled Dino Robot through the dino transform slot.

Various motions are prepared for each transformation.

Please keep in mind that the new Dino Robot will be updated.

[Currently assembable / selectable Dino Robot]
- Tyrannosaurus Red
- Ninja Velocity Raptor
- Spinosaurus
- Triceratops Blue
- Terminator Tyrannosaurus
- Pteranodon
- Lightning Parasaurolophus
- Stegosaurus Gold
- Pteranodon Green
- Deep Plesiosaurus
- Stegoceras
- Tyrabo Double Cops
- Tyrannosaurus Soldier
- Smilodon Black
- Knight Ankylosaurus
- Velociraptor
- Brachiosaurus
- Ancient Octopus
- Pachycephalosaurus
- Velociraptor Cops
- Ceratosaurus
- Mammoth
- Mosasaurus
- Megalodon
- Giganotosaurus
- Tyrannosaurus Cops
- Microceratus
- Fire Tyrannosaurus
